roleset.name: honor with memorial, be a memorial

example.name: agent, no memorial
example.text: Hungary declared itself a democracy and for the first time openly commemorated the anniversary of the 1956 anti - Stalinist uprising that was crushed by the Soviet Union .

propbank.arg: the anniversary of the 1956 anti - Stalinist uprising that was crushed by the Soviet Union

example.name: memorial, no agent
example.text: When President Bush arrives here next week for a hemispheric summit organized to commemorate a century of Costa Rican democracy , will he be able to deliver a credible message in the wake of the Panamanian fiasco ?

propbank.arg: a century of Costa Rican democracy

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: On December 9 , a ceremony was held on Green Island , site of a former political prison , to commemorate the first anniversary of the construction of the Human Rights Memorial there .

propbank.arg: the first anniversary of the construction of the Human Rights Memorial there

roleset.note: COMMEMORATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'commemorate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from commemorate.01-v predicate notes)
COMMEMORATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from commemoration.01-n)
